body.premise: User reports breakage predates remote LTM; project files are the shared state across devices.

most_likely_failure_modes.what_happens: Multiple MB__99_INDEX variants exist; boot loads a stale one or hashes don't match. This causes 'wrong files loaded' behavior.
most_likely_failure_modes.why_this_matches: User saw suspicious small sizes earlier and confusion about what is loaded.

most_likely_failure_modes.what_happens: Multiple boot prompt files exist; an older one is being invoked that does not surface URLs/handshake or uses outdated rules.
most_likely_failure_modes.why_this_matches: User reports boot behavior inconsistent and 'something installed' changed behavior.

most_likely_failure_modes.what_happens: A new MB__03_DELTA in Project Files became active and changed behavior (boot/routing) across devices.
most_likely_failure_modes.why_this_matches: Breakage across devices without LTM implies shared project artifact changed.

most_likely_failure_modes.what_happens: The canonical 5-file contract is violated: missing file, renamed file, or size gate violated (01<2KB or 02<50KB).

fast_isolation_protocol.goal: Identify whether a Project Files artifact drifted and roll back to canonical set without rewriting OS core.

steps.step: 1) Confirm canonical active set and sizes
steps.action: Open MB__99_INDEX__ProjectFiles.txt and MB__00_SENTINEL__ACTIVE_STATE... and confirm they list the same 5 files, and that sizes meet gates.
steps.pass_condition: 5 files match exactly + size plausibility gate passes.

steps.action: In ChatGPT Project Files panel, search 'MB__99_INDEX' and 'MB__00_SENTINEL'. If duplicates exist, keep only the newest one whose embedded hashes match the active set.
steps.pass_condition: Only one MB__99 and one sentinel remain.

steps.action: Temporarily remove MB__03_DELTA__* from Project Files OR rename it to MB__03_DELTA__QUARANTINED__... (if your workflow supports). If removal isn't possible, replace it with a known-good minimal delta that does nothing.
steps.pass_condition: Boot behavior returns to predictable baseline.

steps.action: Ensure the boot prompt file used is MB__BOOT_PROMPT__MetaBlooms_OS_BIOS_v2 (handshake embedded). Remove/ignore older boot prompt variants.
steps.pass_condition: Boot always surfaces URLs and follows handshake.

what_to_send_me_if_still_broken: Exact filenames visible in Project Files panel that start with MB__ (and any duplicates).
The first ~30 lines of MB__00_SENTINEL and MB__99_INDEX.
Name of the delta you 'installed this morning' (exact filename).
